name: UberTrace
description: A service that provides generic trace functionality

functions.name: QueryTraceParams
functions.description: Queries the current set of trace parameters

functions.name: ConfigureTraceParams
functions.description: Configures the current set of trace parameters

functions.name: CancelTrace
functions.description: Cancels a previously requested trace before it starts or after it completes

functions.name: CollectTrace
functions.description: Collects the data created by a previously executed trace
